text:
@NYGovCuomo “Since I am suggesting New Yorkers go on with their life like normal despite coronavirus, here are few movies you should see” -NY mayor 

“Lets put the president on there sitting on the moon saying its just the flu” -NY Gov 

“Forget the politics” -NY Gov

This is weird. #NYC
